column5: Simcoe and Couch look wide open on the satellite.  Might be a good weekend to fish the perch fest.
It will be by the end of this weekend. The bay here still has chunks floating around. I would say I,ll be taken the boat out Sunday afternoon. YEEEEHHHAAAWWWWW

I am waiting to look at todays sat pictures if the sun stays out   I think it will take me too long to get by boat ready to go, I am picking it up Saturday afternoon..so my nitro will not be in the water sunday
